new: Major changes to the light theme color scheme
Improved some of the UI elements for the modals
[Windows] The app now allows only one instance when you have minimize to tray enabled
fixes: [Windows] Fixed an issue which caused multiple instances to start after saving settings
[Windows] Fixed an issue which caused the app to reset after saving settings
[Windows] Fixed an issue which caused settings to crash with tray icon enabled
[Windows] Fixed an issue which resulted in a black border showing up during the app startup for a few seconds
[Mac] Fixed an issue which caused the context menu to stop working
issues: [Mac] Auto-updates do not work when app is on a non-writeable folder such as Downloads
[Windows] Tray icon is visible even after disabling it from Settings and requires restart to compeltely disappear
